name: Dragon's Oddysey
description:
There is a dragon that wants to exit the game he is trapped in… He has awaken up from a bad dream and realized this. Help the dragon to pick up the artifacts, to exit the game world.

The world becomes unstable everytime the player gets one artifact (WIP) There are 5 artifacts and several enemies that will stop the player from his freedom.

Move with WASD or arrow keys Attack with click

Kill all enemies

ps. ironically, the game is kinda unstable as for now.

We finish the basic features for this game, but we have a lot of features to be added.

  • Several weapons to choose at beggining.
  • Some upgrades after the player picks a artifact
  • Some randomness in spawning objects in game, to allow replayability
  • Several improvements to controller scripts
